com.software.reuze

Class lc_ThreadCancelable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.software.reuze.lc_ThreadCancelable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimulationThread

    public class lc_ThreadCancelable
extends Thread
    Implements a thread with an additional flag indicating cancellation.
    Author:
    R. Lunde, Mike Stampone
